# init

**Instance Method**

Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

## Declaration

```swift
bool init();
```

## Return Value

`true` if initialization was successful, or `false` if an error occurred.

## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. Call [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOInterruptDispatchSource/Create] when you want to create a new interrupt dispatch source.

## Configuring the Interrupt Source

- **Create**: Create a dispatch source that reports hardware-related interrupts generated by the specified service provider.
- **free**: Performs any final cleanup for the dispatch source.
- **SetHandler**: Set the handler block to run when the interrupt fires.
